in-uk.legend: Are you currently in the UK?

booked-travel.legend: Have you booked your travel to the UK?

yes.label: Yes, I have booked my travel

no.label: No, I have not booked my travel

booked-travel-date-to-uk.legend: What date you are leaving to travel to the UK?

travel-doc-number.label: Document number
travel-doc-number.hint: Passport or Home Office Travel Document Number. This can contain letters and numbers. For example, 120383978A

travel-doc-nationality.label: Country of nationality
travel-doc-nationality.hint: This is the country of nationality shown on your travel document. Use the English spelling or the countyu code

premium.legend: Did you pay for a priority or super priority service?

premium-priority.label: I paid for a priority service

premium-super-priority.label: I paid for a super priority service

premium-none.label: No, I did not pay for a priority or super priority service

accessing-evisa.legend: Are you having problems accessing your eVisa?

yes.label: Yes, I cannot see my eVisa when I sign in to my UKVI account

no.label: No, the problem is something else

problem.legend: What is the problem with your eVisa?
problem.hint: You can select more than one option

problem-restrictions.label: What you can and cannot do in the UK

problem-signin-email.label: Email address to sign in to your account

problem-signin-phone.label: Phone number to sign in to your account

detail-dob.legend: What is your correct date of birth?

detail-photo.label: What is wrong with your photo?

detail-nin.label: What is your correct National Insurance number?

detail-restrictions.label: What is wrong with the details of what you can and cannot do in the UK?

detail-share-code.label: Which share code are you unable to create?
detail-share-code.hint: This could be for right to work, right to rent or something else

detail-status.label: What problem are you having with your immigration status?
detail-status.hint: This could be because your status is old, incorrect or you cannot view it

detail-valid-from.label: What is the correct date your visa is valid from?

detail-valid-until.label: What is the correct date your visa is valid to?

detail-signin-email.label: What is the correct email address where you can receive security codes?

detail-signin-phone.label: What is the correct phone number where you can receive security codes?

detail-other.label: Describe the problem you are having

is-refugee.legend: Do you have permission to stay in the UK as a refugee?

asylum-support.hint: This is housing or money to support you if you are waiting to find out if you will be given asylum.

no-reference.label: I do not have a reference number

requestor-contact-method.legend: We will contact you to confirm when we have corrected your details, or to let you know if we need more information.

completing-for-someone-else.legend: Are you completing this form on behalf of someone else?
completing-for-someone-else.hint: For example, you are a friend, relative, employer, charity worker or lawyer.
